lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: JUSTINA & JULIAN
lender.loan_because: I'VE ALWAYS WANTED TO HELP OTHER PEOPLE. BUT BEING SO BUSY RAISING MY SON, EXTRACURRICULAR ACTIVITIES, WORKING I'VE NEVER SEEMED TO HAVE THE TIME. AFTER READING BILL CLINTON BOOK ,I READ THE SECTION ON THIS. I KNEW EVEN IF I DIDN'T HAVE TIME , I COULD STILL DO IT MAYBE NOT PHYSICALLY, BUT DEFINITELY OVER THE INTERNET. I AM HAPPY TO DO IT AND CONSIDER MY SELF LUCKY TO HAVE WHAT I HAVE. IT MAY NOT BE MUCH, BUT WHAT I DO HAVE I AM HAPPY TO GIVE.
lender.occupational_info: I WORK IN A ORTHODONTIC OFFICE. WE HELP CHILDREN AND ADULTS GET STRAIGHT TEETH.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others and I want you to be able to support your families.
lender.occupational_info: I help kids who have disabilities learn to use their hands to play and eat.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Small is the way to spend. Small loans from many people will change the world.

lender.name: glenn
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have people help me when I needed help, and now I want to return the favor and help those who are brave enough to try.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Because so many has help me though out my life, this is a way I can give back.
lender.occupational_info: I wanted to be at home more for my children. I am a mom of 4 and two are still at home. They don't stay young forever!

lender.name: Grant, Lisa and Winston
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give and is the right way to live. I would rather give my money to steadfast individuals than wasting it on temporary pleasures provided by: Nordstrom’s, McDonalds, Best Buy etc. Okay, maybe a few items from Best Buy.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of I.T. professionals for a local college.

lender.name: Mitra
lender.loan_because: It's our duty, as good citizens, to spread our good fortune to those who are trying to make a better life for themselves, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am attempting to raise a child who will become an adult who is socially responsible and realizes that helping others has unlimited benefits for our world.

lender.name: Karan
lender.loan_because: I work with a student who wanted to fund raise to help others in another country.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.occupation: Program Coordinator at Inner-city Community Center

lender.name: Douglas

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I help service-based entrepreneurs Make a Living while Making a Difference

lender.name: Bixente
lender.loan_because:
I want to help constructively people in poor countries with little to no access to any funds to start or develop their business.
Helping poor countries get better through sustainable ventures will help the world and reduce inequalities.
This is also why I PLEDGE NOT TO LEND TO ANY WESTERN WORLD "ENTREPRENEUR" as it would be contrary to my idea of Kiva and why I join in the first place.

lender.name: Darrel
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is the essential base requirement for economic freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I work with developing protocols and technologies to further the growth of the Internet

lender.name: Mary Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I care for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a teacher.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I think this scheme is a brilliant way of getting money direct to the people who need it
lender.occupational_info: I own a company which supplies first aid products such as kits, plasters and bandages along with customised kits to all industries

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I have been given much. Even though I am just above the poverty line by American standards, I know I am much richer tham most of the world. I want to be able to help women with children to make better lives for themselves. I love to garden, so I like to help women who are involved in raising food.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and women's studies at a university of 20,000 students. I am a mother of a beautiful 21 year old son.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: It lets me make a real difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Pardon the Shark
lender.loan_because: I really believe that the way to end poverty is to empower and educate people. As the saying goes "Give a man a fish and feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime".
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help people increase their net worth (make more money). I advise people on what investments will help them make more money so that they can have a comfortable retirement, make charitable gifts, provide for their children, etc....I deal with stocks, bonds, mutual funds, commodities, and other securities that are traded around the world.

lender.name: Joshua Home Edwards
lender.loan_because:
Welcome Friend,
If you're reading these words it is possible you're interested in my professional biography because there may be some way I can serve your purpose.
My intention with this message is to share my background with you in a way where you can get a better sense of how my services might be beneficial for you and...before you read any more, I encourage you to check in with your Spirit to ask:
Is the process of reading this message actually the best use of your time?
If it's not I wholeheartedly invite you to move on to the direction that is optimal for you and if this is currently the best place for you to be, I truly thank you for seeing what's available for you here.
With that being said, my response to the situation in the Horn of Africa and all the other under-served areas around the globe is to give it everything I've got to help bring about a Fully Nourished World for everyone in our lifetime (and I'm calling forth miracles here...everybody in the world deserves a full belly every day).
So, I provide Kiva loans when I'm guided and I say more than 1,000 strong prayers over the course of what usually amounts to 3 hours every day to move this vision forward...internally and externally...knowing that this is currently the best way for me to be effective (my total at the moment is more than 1,201,312).
I also serve as a tele-conference conductor for some of the world's leading change agents and I encourage you to google some of the people that I've served including: Barack Obama, Michelle Obama, Joe Biden, Dr. Jean Houston, SARK!, Neale Donald Walsch, Marianne Williamson, John Robbins, Gina Maria Mele (Co-Founder of the Massive Belief Relief clearing process), David Plouffe (Senior Advisor to the President, Author of "The Audacity to Win"), Congresswoman Debbie Wasserman Schultz, Senator Michael Bennet of Colorado, U.S. Representative Judy Chu, Michigan State Senate Minority Leader Gretchen Whitmer, Jim Messina (The 2012 Campaign Manager for Barack Obama), Henry Cisneros (the 10th United States Secretary of Housing and Urban Development), Cecelia Munoz (White House Director of Intergovernmental Affairs), Van Jones (author of "The Green Collar Economy"), Heather Colburn (National Women's Vote Director for OFA), David Axelrod (Senior Adviser for the 2012 Barack Obama Campaign), Tom Coleman (CEO of the Bottom Billion Fund -- http://bottombillionfund.org --which is a microfinance organization that focuses solely on the 1.4 billion people who are subsisting on less than $1.25 a day).
Dr. Matthew Fox (Author of "Original Blessing" and "In the Beginning there was Joy"), Andrew Harvey (Sacred Activist, Mystic, Oxford Scholar), Dave Ellis (Philanthropist, Creator of the Falling Awake coaching program), Ambassador Tony P. Hall (3 time Nobel Prize Nominee, Director of the Alliance to End Hunger), John Hope Bryant (Presidential Advisor, Raised more than $500 Million in contributions to support under-served communities), Roger Thurow (Author of "Enough: Why the World's Poorest Starve in an Age of Plenty"), Mercy Chidi (Founder of Ripples International an NGO that cares for more than 11,000 Kenyan Orphans), Adrian Lovett (European Director of Bono's One Campaign), Thon Moses Chol (one of the "Lost Boys of Sudan", current Delegate to the UN Refugee Congress).
Candace Cable (14 time Paralympic Champion who also pushed her wheelchair from California to Maine), Roshi Joan Halifax (Founder and Director of the Upaya Prison Project), Arielle Ford (Author of "The Soulmate Secret"), Josh Radnor (7 Year Star of "How I Met Your Mother", Humanitarian), Lisa Tener (Facilitator of "How to Write Your Book in 8 Weeks"), Craig Hamilton (Founder of the Academy for Evolutionaries), Claire Zammit (Co-host of the Women on the Edge of Evolution teleseries), Katherine Woodward Thomas (Author of "Calling in The One"), Mastin Kipp (Creator of TheDailyLove.com), James Baraz (Author of "Awakening Joy).
Larry Reed (Director of the Microcredit Summit Campaign), Kidist Belete (Founder of Developing Families Together which supports more than 3.500 Ethiopian residents), Ken Patterson (Global Grassroots Manager for RESULTS), Rev. David Beckmann (President of Bread for the World, World Food Prize laureate), Ron Schultz (Author of more than 20 books and Director of the Center for Social Profit Leadership), Fran Equiza (Regional Director for Horn, East and Central Oxfam International), Glenn Moehling (Coordinator for Elanco's international hunger relief efforts).
Deborah King (author of "Be Your Own Shaman"), Cyndi Dale (author of "The Subtle Body"), Anthony J.W. Benson (Co-Founder of DreamsMadeManifest.com), Debra Evans (Co-Developer of the The 21-Day Consciousness Cleanse e-course as adapted for Oprah.com).
Dr. Rick Hanson (author of Buddha’s Brain: The Practical Neuroscience of Happiness, Love, and Wisdom), Gangaji and Eli Jaxon-Bear (Co-Facilitators of the "Flame of Truth"), Norman Fisher (Director of the Everyday Zen Foundation), Dr. Ira Byock (Author of "Dying Well", "The Four Things that Matter Most" and "Best Care Possible"), Ellie Drake (Founder of BraveHeartWomen.com), Brian Burt (Originator of the Social Conferencing Movement), Cathleen Spacil (Creator of BrainBeHappy.com), Dr. Mike Obsatz (Author of "From Stalemate to Soulmate").
WeForest.org (funded the planting of nearly 1 million trees), The Color of Change.org (an 800,000 member African American advocacy group), MoveOn.org (a 5 million member Civic Action community), Greenopolis.com (recycled more than 46,213,185 pounds of material for a better environment), RainForestECObank.com (replanting local Hope in the Atlantic Rainforest of Brazil), QuestBridge.org (a non-profit team that has assisted more than 6,000 students with a low income receive more than 2 Billion dollars in full scholarships to Ivy League Universities).
Frank Ostaseski (Director for the Metta Institute End-of-Life Care Practitioner Program), Gil Fronsdale (Author of "A Monastery Within"), Relly Nadler (Director of True North Leadership), Rick Mauer (Author of "Beyond the Wall of Resistance"), Laura Fox (Founder of Visionary Culture) and my mentor Dan Emmons (Author of "Life Force: Experience Paradise in Your Lifetime" and is believed by some to be the most effective problem-solver in the world right now) among many other humanitarian luminaries.
lender.occupational_info:
4 messages of gratitude that I've received recently come from people in my prayer family who have said:
1). "Thank You for helping me to stop being a prostitute and start being someone who cares about myself as much as I care about my best friend." (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania)
2). "Thank You for helping me find my glasses...it's a miracle!!!" (Albuquerque, New Mexico)
3). “Thank You for supporting me so that I can help my children have enough food to live.” (Bafoussam, Cameroon, West Africa)
4). “Thank You for helping me to love my fluffy, orange tabby cat sooo much that I enjoy smelling her dandruff." (Chicago, Illinois)
Clearly, it is miraculous what happens when people's prayer needs are met and if you have a specific prayer request, I invite you to send me an email at: FieldsofGoldforEveryone@gmail.com or connect with me through Facebook by going to: http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100002312497034.
Here is one of my favorite reviews so far from my free e-books about being absolutely saturated with Gratitude available at: http://www.StrongPrayers.Net
"Oh My God in Heaven...Joshua, I am astounded at your book of prayers. It is heartwarming, joyful, tearful, heart wrenching...Honey, this book is a winner! Thank you sooooo much for honoring me with some of the pages. i cannot wait to read the rest. Thank you again." Hugs and more hugs, -Myrna W. Florida, U.S.A
Along these lines, you can also experience a source of exponential appreciation by going to https://twitter.com/#!/StrongPrayers4U.
My intention with all my work is to help people profoundly improve the quality of their lives on a permanent level, and I will respond personally and confidentially to your prayer request as soon as possible. I'm available to say no less than 100 prayers per day for 10 people each day. So, if you would like to be on my schedule, I encourage you to contact me if it feels right for you.
On a practical level, I also help people connect with strong sources of effective, integrity-centered funding so that their world serving projects can expand exponentially. Please visit www.CEOspace.net to see if our services can help you get the job done.
And, as a complement to my other commitments, I help build honest, loyal and Magnetic mastermind groups through a series of permanently empowering teleconferences that are designed to substantially increase humanitarian effectiveness in addition to personal prosperity (my clients have received more than a quarter of a million dollars in revenue and contributions due to their participation in these events).
In support of your expansion, I am proud to serve as an ambassador for the generous Maestro Conference affiliate program that you can learn more about through our company website: http://www.MaestroConferenceSolutions.com
With all that being said, I hope this page inspires you to explore how Kiva helps people help themselves and I invite you to...slow...down your mind... far more fully than ever before...so you can respond to this profoundly Enriching question...within yourself...as often as possible:
"Who Would Like to Thank You...Right Now?"
For Your Purpose,
Joshua Home Edwards

lender.name: Ugur

As someone who had many questions in the past about the way most NGOs work, I find Kiva's peer-to-peer direct-investment approach the best there is. All fund-raising campaigns should be this straight forward, transparent, and simple.

lender.name: Cem
lender.loan_because:
2) The Law of Giving This law could also be called the Law of Giving and Receiving, because the universe operates through dynamic exchange. The flow of life is nothing other than the harmonious interaction of all the elements and forces that structure the field of existence. Because your body and your mind and the universe are in constant and dynamic change, stopping the circulation of energy is like stopping the flow of blood. Whenever blood stops flowing, it begins to clot, to stagnate. That is why you must give and receive in order to keep wealth and affluence--or anything you want--circulating in your life. If our only intention is to hold on to our money and hoard it--since it's life energy, we will stop its circulation back into our lives as well. In order to keep that energy coming to us, we have to keep the energy circulating. Thus, the more you give, the more you will receive. The best way to put The Law of Giving into operation is to make a decision that any time you come into contact with anyone, you will give them something. It doesn't have to be in the form of material things; it could be a flower, a compliment or a prayer. In fact, the most powerful forms of giving are non-material. The gifts of caring, attention, affection, appreciation and love are some of the most precious gifts you can give, and they don't cost you anything.
By Deepak Chopra..
I believe in this and the butterfly effect :-)

lender.name: The Baechler Family
lender.loan_because: it feels right.

lender.name: Martin Hamilton
lender.loan_because: I like it to assist someone who is doing a very good job! And it's fine to help other people by reaching their main goals.
lender.occupational_info: I write and direct theatre and televisonserials

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: "It was in my heart to help a little, because I was helped much." - Kahlil Gibran

lender.name: Highrises.com
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are trying to improve their communities by taking risks and solving problems.
lender.occupational_info: Highrises.com is a network of real estate agents who specialize in condominium and loft sales in their respective markets.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: 1. others have assisted me in times of need; 2. we are all in this together; 3. kiva is a great way to transform lives & the world

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: small things can make big differences

lender.name: Karla Miller
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute so that others can find meaningful and sustainable income for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor of a church in the United Church of Christ, where we believe that all people are God's children and all people have gifts of love and justice to share with the world.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected. I believe in the moral imperative to love thy neighbor and in giving more than is comfortable to give.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I take my place beside the countless souls, past and present, bending the long arch of human history toward justice.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people build things they really need and when complete are worth the destruction we caused.

lender.name: Ingrid & Olivia Wilson
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help promote the lives of women in such a simple way. I am a great admirer of Muhammad Yunus and I I'm excited to participate in a process that he pioneered. this is a great way for Olivia to feel involved in this process.
lender.occupational_info: Olivia is a high school student who is about world economy, banking and most importantly compassion. Each time our credit becomes available, Olivia researches the possibilities and chooses the new recipient.

lender.name: Yumiko
lender.loan_because: I believe in great possibility to change the world by ordinary people's good hearts connected through KIVA.

lender.name: GEG
lender.loan_because: it is important to encourage and support the small entrepreneurs in this world. They can create real change.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher/trainer, I am always helping people improve their skill set in order to obtain a better life.

lender.name: Terrence Delaney
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a super easy way to help balance the global economic scales a little bit at a time.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: it is a sustainable business model whose purpose is redemptive in nature. Unlike a donation, which is a one-time event, a loan may be re-given, every time it is repaid, in perpetuity.
lender.occupational_info: I design buildings. I draw what they should look like, and how they should go together. Sometimes I work on new buildings, other times on renovating older ones.

lender.name: Madeline
lender.loan_because:
I care.
"Where is the blessed table to feed all who hunger on earth, welcomed and seated each one joyfully served?" 10,000 Maniacs
lender.occupational_info: I play with paper and paint.

lender.name: Joani
lender.loan_because: My mother taught me that people can benefit more by giving them a "hand up" rather than a "hand out". I want to teach my son the same thing. : )
lender.occupational_info: I'm a hard working mom just trying to help other working moms around the world.

lender.name: Cards For Kiva Cont
lender.loan_because: This profile page is a continuation of http://www.kiva.org/lender/cardsforkiva. What is unique about the loans on this page, is that they were entirely funded by purchases made at Emmaus Road Tulsa, visit them on the web at http://emmausroadtulsa.org/.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: I am a single mother and I want to help other women across the world who are raising families and trying to better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach theatre arts to Middle School Children who range in age from 11 to 13 years old.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I am amazed that through Kiva I can directly impact someone a world away from me to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell used motor vehicles.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to run their own successful business.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: Lending compassion is an easy kind of leanding.

lender.name: Jillian & Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and be able to show my children how to make a mark on the world.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I love to help people. I like knowing that I did something useful and that changed someone's life or helped them in some little way.

lender.name: Don
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software for employee benefit plans - Pension, Health Care, ...

lender.name: Anncha
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the best solutions to help people to live better and I trust this organisation to give them a substainable help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a French student in Finance. Currently I am in Los Angeles for an internship and I would like to work in a Microfinance organisation next year.

lender.name: Ryan Paczkowski
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy. You can loan with simple bank transfers to paypal. It's easy and affordable to feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I hire people for banks!

lender.name: Woody
lender.loan_because: I won Kiva Gift and would be glad to do a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I have been in sales occupations for 5 years but I used to work in UNICEF where I got started doing a good cause to marginalised people around the world regardless of races, colors, religions, sex and ages. Let's make them live happier with brighter future and strengthen theirs society.

lender.name: The Morris Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others.

lender.name: Uchechi Mezieuwachukwu
lender.loan_because: I need a loan to finish my training as a pilot it has been my dream to become a pilot but today i have been able to become a Private Pilot and now needs extenal surport to continue as a commercial pilot all i need is a sponsor who will pay my fees direct to the school.
lender.occupational_info: I repair computer in Durban to earn a leaving and save up to contiune my training

lender.name: Cyndi
lender.loan_because: I was able to pull myself out of a bad situation because I had friends willing to help me succeed. I'm returning that favor.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure that researchers at a medical university have what they need to discover new ways to improve lives.

lender.name: lynnshaze
lender.loan_because: we all need help sometimes, and right now, I'm in a position to help. Before, I was the one who needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office helping my boss run a wastewater treatment plant.

lender.name: Nic
lender.occupational_info: I teach conversational Welsh to adults in Ceredigion, west Wales.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Deep down I feel guilty for having money. I work very hard; don't get me wrong, but somewhere there's someone who needs it more than I do. And I really need it.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers in thousands of hospitals across the world.

lender.name: Jonah
lender.loan_because: feeds are quit expensive and i can no longer afford to buy a sufficient feeds for my chicks
lender.occupational_info: a farmer

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I believe it is my duty as a human being to help others out. Hopefully with my help, people benefiting from my loans will realize their dreams even more and become successful in their lives. We all strive to be successful and helping other people attain that goal is more rewarding than my own personal success. Thank you for letting me help serve other people to met their needs :)

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: Many good people came to my aid when I needed help. Now I'm in a position to give back. And long may it continue
lender.occupational_info: Just having fun.

lender.name: Dermot
lender.loan_because: To try to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Searching for socially responsible businesses.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make globalization a positive movement.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the courts in the State of Montana.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: It is so cool to help people get along in life.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It's a socially concious investment
lender.occupational_info: I organize materials and events for a medical education division and the training programs supported by that division.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I attend university and I am currently studying biology. Soon I hope to go to medical school and become a doctor.

lender.name: Ferdinand the Bull
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ is my Lord and Savior. We are all brothers and sisters in Christ.

lender.name: Burk
lender.loan_because: I see the change that can happen when someone is given a chance
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer that works with a variety of clients, both big and small, around the United States.

lender.name: Speedwell
lender.loan_because:
Deserving hardworking people are worth supporting. Good results are their own reward. Success gives rise to more success. The successful are better positioned to help themselves, their families, and their communities. People help people. There's no point waiting around for God to do it.
My efforts are primarily focused on lending to borrowers whose loan will: first, support a business that contributes directly to the overall prosperity of the community, especially if the business is engineering-related (electrical, mechanical, architectural, computer, or medical); second, encourage literacy by supporting a teacher, school, library, or print shop; or third, support a business that imports or produces goods that contribute to the buyer's feeling of personal prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people all over the world with computer problems. I really enjoy the people I work with, and I enjoy solving problems. It's good to know that I can work with Kiva to help solve the problems of people I might otherwise never know.

lender.name: Shiloh
lender.loan_because: I've been given a hand up in life, and now it's my turn to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I use the written and spoken word to promote services that are meaningful to me.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings that I receive.

lender.name: Holly and Allen
lender.loan_because: We want to uplift lives in a meaningful way. "Just as I am so are they, just as they are so am I"

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I can help make a difference in peoples lives. Helping people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a chain of franchised restaurants

lender.name: HBS Africa Business Club
lender.occupation: MBA students from Harvard Business School

lender.name: R A Cruz
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other to get ahead in this world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the chance to work and achieve their life's goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a marketing company and we produce events. These events are meant to connect people with brands through online/music/video marketing.

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: I also support: Emergency is an independent, neutral and non-political Italian organization. Emergency provides free, high quality medical and surgical treatment to the civilian victims of war, landmines and poverty. Emergency promotes a culture of solidarity, peace and respect for human rights.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I can, therefore I must.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Master's student in Sociology. I focus on social capital, which means the power and resources embedded within social networks, as well as trust and religion.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to give back - in a way that can help others have successes in their own lives.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: I understand the need and the transforming power of micro loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur , with over 20 years of experience in starting small businesses.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: It works.

lender.name: Matt and Cindy
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Roger and Family
lender.loan_because: 1. Every hard working entrepreneur deserves a helping hand. 2. My family wants to share God's blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I help charities raise money.

lender.name: Tim & Laura
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: Tim takes pictures & Laura teaches French.

lender.name: Tre2
lender.loan_because: PIF

lender.name: Mari & Conrad
lender.loan_because: "A mother is a person who seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie." [Tenneva Jordan]
lender.occupational_info: Mari is a teacher at a university. Conrad used to do the same, but in retirement, is building a boat.

lender.name: Don & Paula
lender.loan_because: It is a means of sustainable assistance for the working poor and fulfilling our mission to help others achieve their full potential in life.
lender.occupational_info: We are a professional driver training company.

lender.name: Angel & Linet
lender.loan_because: we're lucky to have enough to cover our needs and wants. We also have family members back home (Puerto Rico) that are in need and we understand what it is to not have enough money to cover your minimum living expenses.

lender.name: Aaron & Sara
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help real people take care of themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Aaron is a video editor. Sara is an academic advisor and a former ESL teacher.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy helping other people.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: In comparison to many in the world, I have an abundance. Life is all about making a positive difference in the lives of others. Hopefully my small contributions will help to make that difference.
lender.occupational_info: High school Economics teacher in Shenzhen, China

lender.name: Jeff Grossman
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is an incredible concept!

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small groups of determined, dedicated citizens to change the world (to paraphrase Margaret Mead)
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse and also a childbirth educator; I love working with birthing women and their families

lender.name: Estelle
lender.loan_because: Reading the stories, makes me realize that I live a priveleged a life, it feels good to give! The success stories are my inspiration.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am studying full time, doing a course in Addictions. I live in a small town in Southern ALberta, so I am doing my course on-line. I will be finished with my course in the summer when I hope to find work in the addictions field.

lender.name: Norfolk Aggie
lender.loan_because: Helping people (especially other farmers) is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: The Norfolk Aggie Animal Science Club is a group of dedicated students studying agriculture. They raise money each year for an agricultural charity to help support the animal industry. Loaning this money helps people use agriculture to better their lives, and in doing so, makes the world a better place for all of us to be.

lender.name: C & Z
lender.loan_because: We love to travel and would like to give back a bit
lender.occupational_info: Computer professional & hairdresser

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: In my last semester of law school I did research on microfinance institutions and microlending caught my interest. It's not a perfect mechanism, but it's creative and helps in a unique way. That's enough for me to lend a hand. I wish I could do more!
lender.occupational_info: I am with the law firm of Dinsmore & Shohl.

lender.name: John and MK
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lender.name: Stephen and Bernie
lender.loan_because: we can, besides these people are out there giving it a go - we'd like to back their efforts in our own small way.

lender.name: Michael and Stacey
lender.occupation: restaurant manager and national account specialist
lender.loan_because: we want to help others because many people have not been affored the same opportunities as us

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: I have also loans to create my business and I know that a little can go a long way in creating a dream and a better way of life.
lender.occupational_info: Spiritual gifts

lender.name: Jayna
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people understand that it is wonderful to share yourself and your culture. Be curious! Learn about other people and their culture. Be respectful! FDR said it right: we have nothing to fear but fear itself.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can and I think that this is an amazing concept.

lender.name: arif
lender.loan_because: i must take one step to prepare my future, i won't when i have family i cant pay about our need, i will make agriculture in indonesia specially in bengkulu province, i hope when i take this loan i i can do help else, with works i give to them, i hope the loan not only help me but it will make another people can feel happy to with chance work i have, i belive i can sucsses with agriculture because my area is agriculture area, some people produce vegetable, coffe, tea, karet(indonesia), i hope you want give me loan
lender.occupational_info: i still study in DEHASEN coledge in bengkulu province at indonesia,now i'm in one step(2nd year) i take finance and banking, now i thingking how i can help another people will happy with jobs i give but i don.t have money to star it, but when i know this program i very happy , because i see one light it can my society my friends, my neigbours,and another else happy with your loan, it's will make another else get from poor, stupid, because arround of me, i see some people can use internet, computer, and a part in 16-20 of them must work to help her family just for eat. i hope very.... very....very.... your loan, (i'm sorry if you have problem to read this describe, because i too focus with my arround is very sad)

lender.loan_because: for Further Study
lender.occupational_info: i have no source to continue study

lender.name: Lori D.
lender.loan_because: I can. Share your blessings.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: wealth is not only what we have but how we give.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: discovery tours
lender.loan_because: Our company believes in supporting the wonderful people from the countries we visit around the world. It is their hospitality and kindness that makes our business who we are today.
lender.occupational_info: We operate tours for fun loving adults over 50 to destinations world wide.

lender.name: Lilia
lender.loan_because: I loan to encourage, inspire, and empower. I loan to share my many blessings and to let those families in difficulty know that I care about them and wish them prosperity. I have been given chances in my life and want to pay it forward in any way I can.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I love that people want to help themselves. They just need a hand!
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses perform well.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to know entrepreneurs & their families in many countries. I want to understand their day-to-day life & culture.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate investment & finance consultant. I research so I can author a comprehensive analysis to give to my client. I advise my client/investor what properties are best to buy & how best to finance them. Then I arrange financing for them to purchase properties.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to live in the wonderful country with education and health care a right. This is a fantastic opportunity for me to give over and over again, I get back much more than I give.

lender.name: tony
lender.loan_because: To give a little can help so much

lender.name: Sarah Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference and help other people
lender.occupational_info: All aspects of real estate buying, selling, property development and property management for a top Australia Real Estate

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I endeavour to awaken acceptance, enthusiasm and awareness in all.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to change someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I manage a branch of a financial institution, mainly lending money to people to buy houses

lender.name: Ainsley
lender.loan_because: if I can I will.
lender.occupational_info: I sell stainless steel.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to be the best they can be and if my small donation helps them to achieve their goals then I am happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Australian Apprenticeships Centre which helps people of all ages to achieve a qualification in their preferred industry with the assistance of government subsidised training and financial incentives.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want people to succeed and have a better future.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference. Helping people help themselves is so rewarding.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have a fortunate life and would like others to have one too
lender.occupational_info: Managing paper and people

lender.name: shira
lender.loan_because:
i have to do SOMEthing, and giving someone the means to enable them to make a living is not just something, its a lot.
i appreciate the fact that these people arent lookin for charity or favors. they really want to work and make a living on their own.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I love to contribute in the lives of those who have dreams to help make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I provide financial information to stakeholders to assist them in making better planning decisions in the organisation.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: because i can x
lender.occupational_info: looking after children while their mother/father guardian has time out

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: i know there are some people not as lucky as my girls
lender.occupational_info: we drive people to hospital in an ambulance

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I want to add a little ray of sunshine...
lender.occupational_info: studying the past to learn for the future

lender.name: Maggi
lender.loan_because: In their hands is the power to shape, transform and mold their world.
lender.occupational_info: My passion is to help others achieve a higher state of self-confidence and to better enjoy their full potential in life.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help my brothers and sisters that are less fortunate than myself

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am committed to helping others less fortunate than I to make a go of their life
lender.occupational_info: Senior manager of a local government Council

lender.name: JENNI
lender.loan_because: This is a small way that I can help in the world and anything positive like this is much needed in our world today.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: We take for granted that there are people in the world less fortunate than ourselves.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.occupational_info: I work at StumbleUpon, I crunch numbers.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: My favourite proverb is "PAY IT FORWARD"
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I operate a cattle grazing business.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: You can't change the world alone but you can change the world around you!!
lender.occupational_info: A specialist nurse who cares for patients after major sugery

lender.name: Darlene & Julie
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher and last year I took some students to Vietnam. It changed their lives and I hope I can help to change yours in some small way.

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because:
I'm passionate about spreading Wealth! like Alvin Toffler said, this is a kind of a Revolutionary Wealth!
Thanks to Web2.0! :)

lender.name: Margarete
lender.loan_because: I have everything I need after a long life of being a woman running my own business This is the money I collected at my 85th Birthday party in lieu of presents, so that I can invest in helping other women reach independence.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after over 50 years of self employment.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in the opportunities I have had and have worked hard. I believe that people who are demonstrating a work ethic, should be given an opportunity to help them work towards achieving their goals. I am a Kiwi, of Samoan descent living in London and hope that Samoans around the world who can spare a few dollars/pounds/tala will give the folk back home an opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have had physical injuries or illnesses.

lender.name: Linnaea
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. It's inspiring and humbling to see that just a little money can make such a huge difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research investigating how the human mind/brain supports our knowledge and use of language and I teach university classes on this topic.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I loan because Kiva will ensure my contributions go directly to those in need. Enabling others to succeed, on their own merit, inspires me.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a wonderful team of engineers who produce great products

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my two beautiful little girls

lender.name: Hot Springs, AR, USA
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and want to help others.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people the way people help me
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand what people want and create products to meet their needs

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want this world to be a better place to be for everyone!
lender.occupational_info: Controller of Mega Project Worldwide.

lender.name: jake
lender.loan_because: I am curious to see how this works. I feel very hopeful about the potential of this concept and the direct one to one hand up approach. Micro-Loans have a greater and longer lasting impact to the entrepreneur and her community than making a donation. A hand-up through training, planning, analyzing and supporting is far better than a hand-out. The hand-up approach promotes self-reliance, financial independence and interdependence which leads to development and progress. Hand-outs encourage continued dependence. Give a woman a fish and you feed her for a day. But teach her to fish and you feed her, her family and neighbours for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I am a clothing and footwear retailer and real estate owner.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Luke 12:48 "...From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked."
lender.occupational_info: Copper Artist

lender.name: Valerio
lender.loan_because: my parents are a product of the Philippines and they have worked hard to give my brother, three sisters, and I a better life in the United States. I believe strongly in paying it forward and I believe in the people of Asia to rise above their economic conditions and make Asia a better place for all natives and descendants. I know that no matter how small my contribution, it makes a big difference in the lives of others elsewhere and the world becomes a better place to live in for everyone! Kiva is the catalyst for a better world and everyone should participate in the Kiva movement.

lender.name: Jarrett
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I study history with hopes of becoming a teacher.

lender.name: Joyce and Norman
lender.loan_because: we would like to help people get started in life.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: The government of my country has significantly screwed up the world. This is a way to show that not all Americans are as thoughtless.
lender.occupational_info: I design electrical distribution systems for buildings. I also design lighting for different spaces whether artistic or pedestrian.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Our life is good and we want the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop user experiences for the Web. I also teach philosophy part-time at the City College of San Francisco.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: The world we live in is smaller than we might think and my hope is that any positive action that I take will spread out from those who receive it and flow to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to get a degree that would enable me to provide psychological counseling and mental health aid to others.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have the opportunity for health, happiness and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with start-up companies that use or provide information technology

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because:
"What we're trying to do may just be a drop in the ocean, but the ocean would be less because of that missing drop"
-Mother Teresa

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs who are strengthening their local communities.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm an owner of a business cooperative in Seattle that works with sustainability-driven businesses and non-profits who need websites and internet services.
My interests include business cooperatives, local economics, and community empowerment.

lender.name: Mohsin & Zarina
lender.loan_because: Gives us joy. Giving is human!

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: i believe it helps create a bit more balance...in a world in need of balance

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to work with solar panels after I graduate.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be able to share.

lender.occupational_info: I'm just 3 years old so my work is to play & make every body happy because I'm Funny.

lender.loan_because: We want to help others with their future. We want people to have an opportunity to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: We work on programs for computers.

lender.name: Charles R.
lender.loan_because: we are all sharing this planet and need to help each other ....

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can all make a small difference and that if enough of us make a small difference it will make a big difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a prison as a counsellor to addicts, trying to help them change their lives.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I had a lemonade stand on the golf course and collected cans to get enough money to make my first loan. I am going to continue so I can make more loans.

lender.name: DEBBIE
lender.loan_because: I get great pleasure in being able to help someone acheive their dreams. If they are prepared to put in the hard work, then I am prepared to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I am an office administrator for a Rendering and Painting Company. I work between 60 and 80 hours a week and manage a staff of 45.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to "pass it forward" since people went out of their way to help me when I was young.

lender.name: GURSHARAN
lender.loan_because: i am a small business owner i just lost my house i have two children and my parents i just moved in rent house i need help to pay my rent ineed $2500 for one year

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus and feel called to help God's children around the world, especially the poor
lender.occupational_info: Enabling and encouraging community transformation in villages around the world with an immediate focus on the village of Kager, Kenya.

lender.name: Lee Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people succeed. We must support people who take responsibility for improving their lives, particularly women who are raising a family by themselves.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: As you travel you realize how fortunate you are and how far these few dollars can go to make a significant difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Work for RBC Royal Bank in the Information Technology department.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: To those who much is given..much is required
lender.occupational_info: I help disadvantaged youth to become and remain successful
